page.title: 04CULWORTH HERITAGE
page.content:
Historic sites worth visiting in the immediate area are********************* *BARROW HILL TUMULUS* ********************* **************************** *CULWORTH CASTLE EARTHWORKS* **************************** ****************************** *MEDIEVAL VILLAGE OF TRAFFORD* ******************************
D'Anvers House although not open to the public deserves a special mention.It was once the home of the most influential family in the area.D'Anvers House East is owned by Mr and Mrs Grant Sara and Lucy were shown round by Mrs Grant.They were very impressed by the four poster bed,the Dutch tiles on the fireplaces and the bedrooms and bath rooms with matching colour schemes and tied back curtains and fabric pelmets.
